name: 大數據分析理論與實務
description: This course aims to train students to learn the theoretical methods and tools of big data analysis to engineering and management problems. The content covers the basic concepts and data preparation of data mining, the method and evidence of data mining, and the advanced application of data mining; so that students can easily apply data mining methods, thereby improving the ability of big data analysis and digital decision making.
goals: Learn basic algorithms for problem solving
syllabus:
Week 1.Introduction

Week 2.The Python Data Science Stack

Week 3.Statistical Visualizations

Week 4.Working with Big Data Frameworks – Hadoop

Week 5.Working with Big Data Frameworks - Spark

Week 6.Data Preparation

Week 7.Association Rule Mining

Week 8.Decision Tree

Week 9.Artificial Neural Network (1)

Week 10.Artificial Neural Network (2)

Week 11.Cluster Analysis

Week 12.Bayesian Network

Week 13.Multivariate Analysis (1)

Week 14.Multivariate Analysis (2)

Week 15.Time Series Analysis

Week 16.Case Analysis of Big Data Analytics (1)

Week 17.Case Analysis of Big Data Analytics (2)

Week 18.Final Examination

methodologies.note: 透過課程介紹各類大數據分析方法與分析工具
透過課堂討論深化理論與實務之了解
透過作業實際操作大數據之分析軟體與平台

grading.note: 隨課程進度將指定作業
範圍包括本學期所教授內容
無法出席請務必請假，缺席1次扣總分5分
